name: Soulbite
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Your soul lashes out and bites the target's soul. Make a spell attack(?) at advantage. If you hit, you deal damage equal to your level, and gain an equal amount of temporary hit points.

You can spend up to 2 additional AP to add the same number of additional attacks against different targets. Temporary hit points gained by this spell on the same turn can stack.
